attributes.action: Prime minister to investigate the continual attack on Rangers Football club by the SFA and SPL
attributes.additional_details: We request an immediate investigation in to the fit for purpose SFA and SPL with regards to their unjust treatment of Rangers Football Club. The timing of decisions and announcements by these bodies have been deliberately aimed at disrupting the administrators task of selling the above club. The latest being the unjust transfer embargo which  severely impacts on the future of this great Scottish and worldwide institution.

rejection.details: Regulation of football in Scotland is a matter for the SFA and SPL.
